title: New: Miyuki – Shizukana
content:
Russian based producer Miyuki spread across the blogs like wildfire several months back with her stunning, minimalist dubstep jams, channeling Burial in a futuristic and grossly appealing manner.

Having released a concept EP in the meantime, detailing the journey of an android living in a post-apocalyptic whirlwind, caught in an eternity of nothingness. Newest cut from the young musician, Shizukana, sees her returning more to her roots, and experimenting with the silences and crescendo’s that make her music so immersive. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
